physical_examinations.vital_signs: ALT 529 U/L, AST 306 U/L, total bilirubin normal
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The patient became jaundiced three months later, with ALT 331 U/L and AST 540 U/L at 7 months after onset.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: ALT 331 U/L, AST 540 U/L, total bilirubin 4.3 mg/dL, HCV load 6,144,372 IU/mL
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Stage 3 fibrosis observed in liver biopsy.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: ALT and AST remained elevated until 17 months after onset, at which point he developed signs of decompensated cirrhosis.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Albumin 1.8 g/dL, total bilirubin 11.6 mg/dL, INR 3.5, platelet count 85,000 cells/Î¼L, MELD score 30
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Decompensated cirrhosis with manifestations including pedal edema and small esophageal varices.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: MELD score rose to 34 over the next few months; developed ascites.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: ALT 436 U/L, AST 220 U/L, total bilirubin normal, HCV load 26,600,000 IU/mL
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Elevation of liver transaminases; seroconversion to HCV Ab positivity.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Liver transaminases peaked at biopsy 4 months later but subsequently remained in the 200-300 U/L range.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: ALT 622 U/L, AST 343 U/L (at peak), with stage 2 fibrosis and grade 2 inflammation
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Liver biopsy showed inflammation and fibrosis.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient presented with ascites and esophageal varices 10 months later.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: ALT 114 U/L, AST 78 U/L, total bilirubin normal, HCV load 10,700,000 IU/mL
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Refused HCV treatment; progressed to decompensated liver disease with massive ascites.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: AST 332 IU/L, ALT 367 IU/L, total bilirubin normal
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Underwent percutaneous liver biopsy showing stage 3 fibrosis, one year later showed stage 4 fibrosis; died 7 months after return to medical care.
